T02D1292:151b-1: shr'i he badzra s'a dha na /
T02D1292:151b-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1292:152a-2: kun nas dang bas rje btsun gyi //
T02D1292:152a-3: zhabs kyi padmar gus btud de //
T02D1292:152a-4: blo dman rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D1292:152a-5: dgyes pa rdo rje sgrub thabs bri //
T02D1292:152a-6: 'dir rten gyi khyad par thun mong dang /
T02D1292:152a-7: thun mong ma yin pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pas /
T02D1292:152a-8: gnas dur khrod la sogs par /
T02D1292:152a-9: nam gyi brgyad cha la langs te /
T02D1292:152a-11: chu sbyin byas nas mandala phul nas de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa bshams la /
T02D1292:152a-12: stan nang tshangs can la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02D1292:152a-13: he badzra zhes brjod pas skad cig gis rang nyid
T02D1292:152a-14: he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis par bsgoms pa'i
T02D1292:152a-15: rjes la / rang gi snying gar re pha bsgom //
T02D1292:152a-16: de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02D1292:152a-17: der ni h'um gi rnam pa nyid //
T02D1292:152a-18: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can //
T02D1292:152a-20: nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni //
T02D1292:152a-21: rdo rje skye ba snying rje che //
T02D1292:152a-22: rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1292:152a-23: lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod //
T02D1292:152a-24: dkar mo ri dags mtshan ma 'dzin //
T02D1292:152a-25: chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod //
T02D1292:152a-26: ro langs ma ni chu lag ma //
T02D1292:152a-28: pukka s'i ni rdo rje'i lag / de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin //
T02D1292:152a-29: gdol pa mo ni cang te'u brdung //
T02D1292:152a-30: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
T02D1292:152a-31: 'dod chags chen po rjes chags nas //
T02D1292:152a-32: g-yung mo sku la 'khyud pa nyid //
T02D1292:152a-33: de lta bu'i tshogs rten blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs la /
T02D1292:152a-35: phyi nang gsang ba dang de kho na'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1292:152a-37: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1292:152a-40: kun rdzob dang don dam gyi bdag nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1292:152a-41: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos la /
T02D1292:152a-42: tshogs rten rnams la blos btang ba'am /
T02D1292:152a-44: de nas dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1292:152a-45: gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing //
T02D1292:152a-46: gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang //
T02D1292:152a-47: kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so //
T02D1292:152a-48: yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste //
T02D1292:152a-49: de yang spro bsdu sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1292:152a-50: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1292:152a-52: chos thams cad sgyu ma tsam du bsgom mo //
T02D1292:152b-0: re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam @152b bsgoms nas //
T02D1292:152b-1: nyi der h'um byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02D1292:152b-2: rdo rje de nyid kyi ni ra ba dang //
T02D1292:152b-3: gur bcings pa yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid //
T02D1292:152b-4: de yi nang du bhr'um las byung ba yis //
T02D1292:152b-5: phyir log 'khor lo lta bu yi //
T02D1292:152b-6: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu rgya che zhing //
T02D1292:152b-7: khong stong mi g-yo 'khor bar bsgom //
T02D1292:152b-8: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
T02D1292:152b-9: dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni //
T02D1292:152b-10: 'khor lo'i sngon du ci rigs par //
T02D1292:152b-11: lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid //
T02D1292:152b-13: ji ltar rigs par byin za dang //
T02D1292:152b-14: lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang //
T02D1292:152b-15: de steng bhr'um las 'khor lo dang //
T02D1292:152b-16: thig ler gyur pas gzhal yas khang //
T02D1292:152b-17: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1292:152b-18: padma 'dab brgyad 'phar ma gcig / ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan //
T02D1292:152b-19: dra ba dra phyed pa dang //
T02D1292:152b-20: dur khrod brgyad dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1292:152b-21: phyi nang rdo rje'i thig gis spras //
T02D1292:152b-22: lte bar ro ni rnam bsgom pa //
T02D1292:152b-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin brjod //
T02D1292:152b-24: 'dab ma brgyad la bsam pa ni //
T02D1292:152b-25: tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag / gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang //
T02D1292:152b-26: bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris //
T02D1292:152b-27: goo r'i la sogs rnams kyi gdan //
T02D1292:152b-28: nyi mar bcas pa'i ro dgu bsam //
T02D1292:152b-29: a'a li zla ba k'a li nyi //
T02D1292:152b-30: dgung gnyis rnal 'byor ma yis bsgom //
T02D1292:152b-31: dbus kyi nyi zla kha sbyar bar //
T02D1292:152b-32: n'a da lhung bas h'um du gyur //
T02D1292:152b-33: h'um las gam sogs spro bar bya //
T02D1292:152b-34: gam tsam bam gham pam sham lam dam goo r'i la sogs pa'o //
T02D1292:152b-35: de las spros shing bsdus pa las //
T02D1292:152b-36: dbus kyi gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1292:152b-37: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje ste //
T02D1292:152b-38: kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po //
T02D1292:152b-39: rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par //
T02D1292:152b-40: yang ni h'um gis de nyid bsgom //
T02D1292:152b-41: 'khor rnams gri gug rde chung dang /
T02D1292:152b-42: rus sbal sbrul ni phyogs su'o //
T02D1292:152b-43: seng ge dang ni dge slong dang //
T02D1292:152b-45: rang rang sa bon dag gis mtshan //
T02D1292:152b-46: yang ni spro bsdus sa bon bsdu //
T02D1292:152b-47: de las lnga pa gzugs brnyan rdzogs //
T02D1292:152b-48: h'um gi rnam par gyur bltas nas //
T02D1292:152b-49: zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom //
T02D1292:152b-50: rdo rje skye ba nag po che //
T02D1292:152b-51: 'dam skyes sngon mo 'dra ba'i mdog / yang na
T02D1292:152b-52: sngon dang nyi ma'i mdog / dad pas nges par
T02D1292:152b-53: rnam par bsgom // sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog / pandu dmar po'i spyan dang ldan //
T02D1292:152b-54: skra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang //
T02D1292:152b-55: phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1292:153a-2: lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid //
T02D1292:153a-3: sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa //
T02D1292:153a-4: 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags //
T02D1292:153a-5: sdang mig brgyad gnyis lon pa'i tshul //
T02D1292:153a-6: g-yon na rdo rje thod pa dang //
T02D1292:153a-7: g-yon pa nas kyang kha tv'am ga / g-yas na rdo rje nag po nyid //
T02D1292:153a-8: h'um gi yi ge 'don ba'i bdag / rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas //
T02D1292:153a-9: dur khrod du ni mgon po rol //
T02D1292:153a-10: dbang dkar gshin rje chom rkun ma //
T02D1292:153a-11: chu bdag phyogs su rol pa mo //
T02D1292:153a-12: lus ngan por ni ghasma r'i //
T02D1292:153a-13: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
T02D1292:153a-14: mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma //
T02D1292:153a-15: bden bral gdol pa mo gzhag cing //
T02D1292:153a-16: rlung du g-yung mo rnam par bzhag / dkar mo g-yas na gri gug ste //
T02D1292:153a-17: de bzhin g-yon na ro hi ta //
T02D1292:153a-18: chom rkun ma g-yas cang te'u //
T02D1292:153a-19: g-yon pa'i phyag na phyag pa nyid //
T02D1292:153a-20: ro langs ma g-yas rus sbal te //
T02D1292:153a-21: g-yon pa yis ni padma'i snod //
T02D1292:153a-22: ghasma r'i ni g-yas na sbrul //
T02D1292:153a-23: g-yon par rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid //
T02D1292:153a-24: pukka s'i g-yas seng ge ste //
T02D1292:153a-25: g-yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no //
T02D1292:153a-26: ri khrod ma g-yas dge slong ste //
T02D1292:153a-27: g-yon na gsil byed de bzhin no //
T02D1292:153a-28: gdol pa mo g-yas 'khor lo ste //
T02D1292:153a-29: g-yon pas thod pa de bzhin no //
T02D1292:153a-30: g-yung mo g-yas na rdo rje ste //
T02D1292:153a-31: g-yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no //
T02D1292:153a-32: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1292:153a-33: dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod //
T02D1292:153a-34: spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste //
T02D1292:153a-35: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1292:153a-36: goo r'i kha dog nag por gyur //
T02D1292:153a-37: chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs //
T02D1292:153a-38: ro langs ma ni gser btsos bzhin //
T02D1292:153a-39: ghasma r'i ni ma rka ta mtshungs //
T02D1292:153a-40: pukka s'i ni dbang sngon mtshungs //
T02D1292:153a-41: ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od //
T02D1292:153a-42: gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma //
T02D1292:153a-43: g-yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod //
T02D1292:153a-44: de nas zhi ba'i yig 'bru dgod //
T02D1292:153a-45: mig la gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1292:153a-46: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1292:153a-47: sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad //
T02D1292:153a-48: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1292:153a-49: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1292:153a-50: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1292:153a-51: dbang po rnams ni dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1292:153a-52: 'dis ni cho ga sems dpa' che //
T02D1292:153a-53: de nas gnas gsum byin gyis brlab //
T02D1292:153a-54: spyi bor sa spyod mgrin par mkha' //
T02D1292:153a-55: snying gar bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1292:153b-0: spro @153b bsdu sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsdu //
T02D1292:153b-1: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te //
T02D1292:153b-2: mchod bstod dgug gzhug dbang du bya //
T02D1292:153b-3: rigs lnga la sogs spyan drangs te //
T02D1292:153b-4: mchod cing gsol gdab dbang bskur bas //
T02D1292:153b-5: zhe sdang phyag rgya gtso bo la //
T02D1292:153b-6: zhe sdang phyag rgya pukka s'i //
T02D1292:153b-7: gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma //
T02D1292:153b-8: ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo //
T02D1292:153b-9: 'dod chags phyag rgyas g-yung mo nyid //
T02D1292:153b-10: yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang rgyas //
T02D1292:153b-11: gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma //
T02D1292:153b-12: ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma //
T02D1292:153b-14: kha tv'am ga dang rjes chags bya'o //
T02D1292:153b-15: bdag byin brlab sogs rdzogs rim bsgom //
T02D1292:153b-16: de nas rnal 'byor ma brgyad po //
T02D1292:153b-17: thugs ka'i h'um la bsdu byas la //
T02D1292:153b-18: de yi nang gi rgyas gdab bsgom //
T02D1292:153b-19: de rjes dag pa rjes dran bya //
T02D1292:153b-20: bzlas thabs bzhi yi rim pa yis //
T02D1292:153b-21: ngag gi sgrib sbyong gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D1292:153b-22: aom tree lo kya a'akshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1292:153b-23: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1292:153b-24: gtor ma de nyid bzhi ldan btang //
T02D1292:153b-25: smon lam btab la spyod lam bya'o //
T02D1292:153b-26: rgyun du thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor bsgom //
T02D1292:153b-27: cho ga'i rim pa de nyid kyis //
T02D1292:153b-28: phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba'i rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1292:153b-29: gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang sku mdog dang h'um las byung ba'o //
T02D1292:153b-30: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa
T02D1292:153b-31: lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba
T02D1292:153b-32: / de bzhin du g-yas kyi phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D1292:153b-33: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1292:153b-34: shes rab ma rdo rje phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no //
T02D1292:153b-35: de'i sngags ni aom dzva la dzva la bhyo h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1292:153b-36: phyag drug pa zhal gsum pa /
T02D1292:153b-38: g-yas pa zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu /
T02D1292:153b-40: gcer bu gong du gsungs pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can no //
T02D1292:153b-41: phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1292:153b-42: phyag g-yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa /
T02D1292:153b-43: g-yas kyi dang po ni rdo rje /
T02D1292:153b-44: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu /
T02D1292:153b-45: phyag g-yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug / phyag
T02D1292:153b-46: lhag ma gnyis kyis yum lu gu rgyud ma dang
T02D1292:153b-47: snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1292:153b-48: de yang bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab ma ste /
T02D1292:154a-0: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa @154a * //
T02D1292:154a-2: khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o //
T02D1292:154a-4: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1292:154a-5: dpal ldan 'bum lnga la brten rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1292:154a-6: bla ma'i gsung gis gsal bar byas nas rnam spras pa'i //
T02D1292:154a-7: de dges 'gro ba 'di kun srid mtsho brgal gyur nas //
T02D1292:154a-8: bde mtha' gcig bu dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur
T02D1292:154a-9: cig / dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i gtso bo sems
T02D1292:154a-10: dpa' gsum gyi sgrub thabs rje n'a ro pa'i zhal
